name: MasterPiece Code 001
description:
just your typical RPG game.

I've decided to release this gradually every month until the game is finished. at least, I hope I have enough time and money to do that.

There's not much content for now, so I made some mini-games instead.

also, I only check the game once, so there are definitely some bugs. if you found one, you can comment here, I'll try to fix it next month. or if it makes the game stuck and unplayable, I'll try to fix it asap.

Finally, if you have any ideas or want to request something, you can comment about it down here.

you can also comment about your experience in the game. or if you have any questions regarding the gameplay.

well then, see you next month.
